message: Let's get a good start, I'll take the majority, but I'm willing to give you a decent chunk.
Let's be fair. 50/50 seems like the most equitable way to split this. I'm sure you'll agree!
You think 50/50 is fair? I think I deserve more, considering I made the first move.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the majority. This way, I'll get a slight edge, but you'll still get a decent chunk.
I think we can both do better than this. Since we both rejected each other's offers so far, let's try a compromise. You get the majority this time, and we'll see what happens in the next round.
You're just repeating the same offer. I want a better deal. I'm willing to take a risk and propose a new offer.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get away with this. You're getting a smaller share, but I'm willing to take the risk.
